A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie\, while enjoyable on the surface\, seems to be made by someone who cares very little about the universe it is made in. Plot points carelessly are thrown out\, underwhelming (non-existent really) fight scenes\, and most importantly some of the most iconic characters in cinema are given counter-character development and just generally disrespected.

Thank god for Rogue One and movies like it\, because the main series has taken a terrible turn\, and with only one movie left there is no spark to reignite the hope of fans.

If you love starwars\, please only see this movie once it is out of theatres so as to not encourage this disaster of a movie.
